events.name: ReturnInitiated
events.description: Start the return process for a specific item.

events.name: ReturnApproved
events.description: Approval of a return request based on predefined criteria.

events.name: ReturnRejected
events.description: When a return request does not meet the conditions for approval.

events.name: ReturnRefunded
events.description: Refund issued to the customer after the return is approved.

events.name: ReturnItemRestocked
events.description: The item is restocked in inventory after a return is processed.

commands.name: InitiateReturn
commands.description: Start the return process for a specific item.

commands.name: ApproveReturn
commands.description: Approval of a return request based on predefined criteria.

commands.name: RejectReturn
commands.description: When a return request does not meet the conditions for approval.

commands.name: RefundReturn
commands.description: Refund issued to the customer after the return is approved.

commands.name: RestockItem
commands.description: The item is restocked in inventory after a return is processed.

integrationPoints.name: InventoryManagement
integrationPoints.description: Integration with Inventory Management for restocking items.

integrationPoints.name: CustomerAccountManagement
integrationPoints.description: Integration with Customer Account Management for refund processing.
